alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 3:29PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sweetwater County through 400 PM MDT... At 328 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles southwest of Bitter Creek Rest Area, or 22 miles southeast of Rock Springs, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Sweetwater County, including the following locations... Point Of Rocks and Bitter Creek. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 130 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
